mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mapa de la peninsula de Yucatán (Mexico): comprendiendo los estados de Yucatán y Campeche y el territorio de Quintana Roo / arreglado con nuevos datos topográficos y astronómicos por Antonio Espinosa Ingeniero
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Espinosa, Antonio.
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: United States. War Department. Military Intelligence Division
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Reproduced by Military Intelligence Division, General Staff
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "A la memoria di mi Abuelo, el Sr. Don José Martin y Espinosa de Los Monteros [with an oval portrait] printed just to the right of the title.
Includes a detailed legend and text about territorial subdivisions.
Text in Spanish except for imprint.
